[vc_row][vc_column][vc_empty_space height=”120px”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1618460335873{background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}”]

Join the Tapstarter Logo Design Competition

Calling all Designers in the Crypto-sphere and beyond!
Logo Brief: Futuristic, incubator and startup launchpad…
We are searching for a logo for Tapstarter and will be drawing a winner in two weeks!   
Winner will be selected by the 20/04/2021.
Prize is 0.2 ETH and 1000 TAPS Tokens.  
RULES:
Only two Logo submissions per IP
You may only vote once on a logo to win from each IP
1. To Enter a logo into the competition, please upload only a jpg, jpeg or png file (size 500×500)
2. View and vote, click the Submissions tab
Good luck and may the best design win!

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_raw_html]JTVCdG90YWxjb250ZXN0JTIwY29udGVzdCUzRCUyMjcyNiUyMiU1RA==[/vc_raw_html][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][/vc_column][/vc_row]
